executive_summary: Systems are green across the board, with storage capacity holding steady at 73%. Primary mission today is refining the dashboard layout and ensuring the data pipelines flow smoothly.

news.headline: Gemini 3.1 Pro Leaks Show Massive Logic Gains
news.summary: Benchmarks leaked early this morning suggest Google's new model outperforms GPT-5 on reasoning tasks by a wide margin.

news.headline: Vail School District Announces New Tech Initiative
news.summary: Local schools are rolling out a new AI literacy program starting next semester.

news.headline: Tucson Tech Corridor expansion approved
news.summary: City council votes unanimously to rezone the southeast corridor for new tech offices.

newsletters.subject: The AI Value Chain
newsletters.summary: Ben argues that the value is shifting from model providers to application layers. Also covers the new Nvidia chips.
newsletters.body: The shift in value capture is becoming undeniable. While model weights compress, the stickiness of workflows increases. Nvidia announced the B200 today...

newsletters.subject: OpenAI's $7T Ask
newsletters.summary: Sam Altman is reportedly seeking 7 trillion dollars for chip manufacturing infrastructure. Plus: new open source models from Meta.
newsletters.body: Sam Altman's ambition knows no bounds. The reported $7T fund would reshape the global semiconductor supply chain. Meanwhile, Llama 4 70B just dropped...

weather.narrative: Clear skies and mild temperatures. Perfect for a lunch break walk.
